item.description:
From Aspire Restuarant in Providence, RI (http://www.aspirerestaurant.com/):

"Yappy Hour Every Monday Night, 6- 8:30pm: Join us along with our partners, Furry Friends Pet Care Services and Providence Animal Rescue League for our popular Monday Happy Hour(s) for dogs! Bring your well-behaved, on- leash dogs and enjoy food, drinks and fun outside with other pet owners in our beautiful outdoor courtyard.

We will feature different vendors throughout the season (pet photographers, trainers, nutritionists, etc). Please share with all of your animal-loving friends! See you and your best friend every Monday from 6- 8:30p! (Weekly rain date is Tuesday). Complimentary valet parking.

SPECIAL Yappy Hour Event: July 2nd, 6 - 8:30p: The Friends of Attleboro Animal Shelter (http://www.faaspets.org/), a non-profit organization, will be having a fundraiser during Yappy Hour on July 2nd! We are proud to host this all-volunteer organization who donate their time and hearts to the Cats & Dogs in Attleboro and surrounding communities. Their dedication and commitment is achieved through adoptions, community awareness, fostering and caring for companion animals until loving homes can be found. Please come out and show your support! 1/2 price apps, drink specials, free valet parking and great raffle prizes!!"

Take your well-behaved bully & represent! Look for Patty Nichols (http://www.facebook.com/funknfuzz) & Sebby, our ambassador for RI/CT!

If your dog is having behavioral issues preventing you from being able to attend events like this, please email justcassie101@gmail.com for information, references & resources.
item.name: Yappy Hour at Aspire Restaurant in Providence!
